name: Help me release my first solo album on Wiener Records!
blurb: I'm creating original punk music to be on WIENER RECORDS. I'm looking at 100 tapes for $250 + shipping. Info: www.wienerrecords.org

name: A Great Notion - A Little Scared vinyl EP
blurb: Help A Great Notion and Aaahh!!! Real Records release the "A Little Scared" EP on gorgeous coloured vinyl!

name: Help The Anchorage release their new album "Regrow"
blurb: The Anchorage has FINALLY finished recording their 2nd full length "Regrow"! Help offset CD manufacturing costs and preorder your copy!

name: Self Proclaimed Narcissist's New Album - "I Am The End Boss"
blurb: Self Proclaimed Narcissist is currently recording the greatest record of all time - "I Am The End Boss" and needs YOUR help to fund it!

name: The Lucitones Record and Release an Album
blurb: Flathead Valley's own high energy rock n' roll band, The Lucitones, are hitting the road to record and release their first album.

name: Pre-order DANCEHALL's debut album on 12" LP / CD / Download
blurb: Help fund the manufacturing of DANCEHALL's self-released debut album by pre-ordering it in advance.

name: Lust Control-Tiny Little Dots: Getting it right the 2nd time
blurb: If you fail ... get back up!

name: A sad as heck pop punk album.
blurb: 'I Promise It Will Be Okay.' by Arwings

name: Help Five Iron Frenzy make a new album
THE SPIRIT OF THE STAIRCASE by As Good As It Gets
blurb:
